titles.title: Katie Sepich Enhanced DNA Collection Act of 2011
Katie Sepich Enhanced DNA Collection Act of 2011
To authorize the Attorney General to award grants for States to implement minimum and enhanced DNA collection processes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime, Terrorism, and Homeland Security.

bill.summary: Katie Sepich Enhanced DNA Collection Act of 2011 - Directs the Attorney General to make grants to assist states with costs associated with the implementation of minimum or enhanced DNA collection processes. Defines such processes for the purpose of this Act. Awards bonus payments to states that have implemented and used an enhanced DNA collection process.
